flawed_nl_solution:
Last year he had 39 cows - 25 cows - 6 cows = <<39-25-6=8>>8 cows.
This year after the number of the cows has increased he has 8 cows + 24 cows = <<8+24=32>>32 cows.
After he bought more cows he now has 32 cows + 43 cows = <<32+43=57>>57 cows.
After his friend gave him cows he now has 57 cows + 8 cows = <<57+8=65>>65 cows.
#### 65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
